body_html:
Hi @dave-msk I think most of part of your suggestions sound great.

We should allow user to specify the device_fn in RunConfig and respect that. If the device_fn is None, we create a default one (old behavior).

I left some comments in the files. I think we should drop the ps_strategy in the RunConfig as device_fn provides higher level support for that. Advanced users could create device_fn directly and use different ps_strategy.
